title: It's just gotten ridiculous.

embed.description: This is "Unit collision actually snare-HD 720p" by Lord Sesshomaru on Vimeo, the home for high quality videos and the people who love them.

body:
We all know that minion block is too stupid atm. Your champion has to path round entire waves often when there are blatant gaps between the minions _(gaps sometimes wide enough for Blitz Pulls to still get you)_.

and this situation really takes the cake.
_(i was spamming move commands, and Sol just couldn't budge for a solid 4 or 5 seconds.)_

For a champion whose entire source of damage relies on moving around, this was extremely debilitating, and caused me to enter the battle quite a few seconds late. Had I not been completely snared I could have either Killed or scared off Vayne, and Shen would have lived _(which could have been vital seeming we had an AFK, and every life counts)_, as well as slowed down Rakan so he would be late and more hesitant to enter the battle.

Riot doesn't seem too bothered about unit collision atm. They at least haven't mentioned it, or any plans of changing it that I have seen. Which makes me think that this is working as intended.

_______

So Id like to know, officially:
Is this working as intended?

If so:
Why is this behaviour intentional?

If not:
When/what plans are there to change it? 


Also if people have any other stories/vids it'd be interesting to see them. ^^

replies.body:
Had it happen about 5 times last Thursday/Friday while trying out Xayah in Coop VS AI. Died each time because it happened under enemy towers. It didn't seem like anything was wrong, just had my champ walking through minion waves, then all of a sudden they get "stuck" trying to path around individual minions, which didn't work, then trying to frantically move then around the wave myself only to die from spending too much time under turret.

At the very least, you would think it wouldn't be intentional for it to happen with friendly minions, but it does, so definitely something Riot needs to fix (and quite frankly I don't care if it is intentional, it just needs to be fixed).

Seriously, I shouldn't be dying to bots because I'm getting minion blocked.
Take ghost to escape from minion block. (Most likely riot response)

Yeah happened to me last game when I was playing Tahm. 

Tbh though it only stopped me from throwing my ADC into the enemy fountain xD
The real issue comes in when you get stuck in the side of a tower for a good 7 min stuck in walking animation unable to back or get out, no minions required.

> We all know that minion block is too stupid atm.

{{champion:38}}  i got you fam

I have been spamming Kass the last couple of days xD
chasing that lvl 7

That there is just a straight up bug and shouldn't exist, being caught in the tower between a minion and being stuck for a good 4 seconds is not something that can just easily be avoided. It almost sounds ridiculous if you think about it, then again minion block has existed for a long time and Riot hasn't done anything about it like it's actually a legit element in the game.
